fields.label: Small Hero
fields.name: small_hero
fields.instructions: Settings for the shorter heros that appear on pages other than the home page

sub_fields.label: Subheading Paragraph
sub_fields.name: subheading_paragraph
sub_fields.instructions: Enter any addition content you want bellow the heading

sub_fields.label: Alternative Page Title
sub_fields.name: alternative_page_title
sub_fields.instructions: If you want  a title in the hero that is different than the page name enter it here.

fields.label: Add Page Links?
fields.name: add_page_links
fields.instructions: Check to add inner pages submenu links.

fields.label: Add Grey Background To Page Links?
fields.name: add_grey_background_links
fields.instructions: Check for grey background uncheck for white background

fields.label: Show Flexible Contact Area
fields.name: show_flexible_contact_area
fields.instructions: Check to add Flexible Contact  Area

sub_fields.label: Title
sub_fields.name: title
sub_fields.instructions: Enter the title for the section

sub_fields.label: Add Grey Background?
sub_fields.name: add_grey_background
sub_fields.instructions: Check for grey background uncheck for white background

fields.label: Add Grey Background  Stats Cards
fields.name: add_grey_background_stats_cards
fields.instructions: Check for grey background uncheck for white background

fields.label: Numbered Reasons Slider Title
fields.name: numbered_reasons_slider_title
fields.instructions: Enter the Title for the section

fields.label: Numbered Reasons Slider Content
fields.name: numbered_reasons_slider_content
fields.instructions: Add a minimum of 3 reasons (images and the text) for the slider

fields.label: Remove Images On Mobile
fields.name: remove_images_on_mobile
fields.instructions: Check this box if you want to remove images on mobile

fields.label: Add Grey Background Reasons Slider
fields.name: add_grey_background_reasons_slider
fields.instructions: Check for grey background uncheck for white background

fields.label: Show Past Attendees
fields.name: show_past_attendees
fields.instructions: Check to add Past Attendees area

fields.label: Add Grey Background Attendees
fields.name: add_grey_background_attendees
fields.instructions: Check for grey background uncheck for white background

fields.label: Flexible Content Area with Button Under
Show Flexible Content Area with Button Under

fields.label: Show Venue
fields.name: show_venue
fields.instructions: Check to add the venue area

sub_fields.label: Add Map?
sub_fields.name: add_map
sub_fields.instructions: Add a map instead of an image?

sub_fields.label: Map Code
sub_fields.name: map_code
sub_fields.instructions: Paste the map embed code into the text tab

fields.label: Add Grey Background Venue
fields.name: add_grey_background_venue
fields.instructions: Check for grey background uncheck for white background

sub_fields.label: Email

fields.label: Add Grey Background Team

fields.label: Show Newsletter?
fields.name: show_newsletter
fields.instructions: Would you like to show the newsletter on this page?

fields.label: FAQ Tab to be open
fields.name: open_tab
fields.instructions: If you would like a different tab than the first FAQ tab to be open on page load please enter the name of it below. You must match the name exactly.
